title: 820-3437-b no audio
message:
No evidence of spillage. I tried good i/o cable and board but still no Audio. Os does not see any audio device.  checked J9500 under microscope for bad connection.
AUDIO_PWR_EN  3.3v
PP1V5_S0SW_AUDIO 1.5v
I also replaced U8040 .

title: 820-3437-b no audio
message:
Any history available?

If audio codec is not recognized, you should have problems with HDA_x lines.
Check R1310-13 resistors first.

title: 820-3437-b no audio
message: Those resistors measure and look fine. This came with no sound, no evidence of spillage. No audio hardware in OS.

title: 820-3437-b no audio
message: Check HDA_RST_L level; compare with working board.

title: 820-3437-b no audio
message: Compare diode mode readings on HDA_x lines with good board.

title: 820-3437-b no audio
message: Update. I replaced the Smc for a second time and audio now works. Thanks for your assistance.
